summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that verify the proper loading, tokenization, and preprocessing of automatic speech recognition (ASR) datasets under multiple configurations such as DALI audio loading, BPE or character tokenization, tarred file handling, feature‑to‑text conversion, and RTTM alignment.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of ASR data pipelines before deployment or research experiments, reducing runtime errors and ensuring consistent model training data.
